# Scroll Snap Type

## Usage

For detailed information, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class                  | Support     |
|------------------------|-------------|
| `snap-none`            | 🌐 Web only |
| `snap-x`               | 🌐 Web only |
| `snap-y`               | 🌐 Web only |
| `snap-both`            | 🌐 Web only |
| `snap-mandatory`       | 🌐 Web only |
| `snap-proximity`       | 🌐 Web only |
